an5.122:1.1: “Yo hi koci, bhikkhave, bhikkhu va bhikkhuni va panca dhamme bhaveti panca dhamme bahulikaroti, tassa dvinnam phalanam annataram phalam patikankham—
an5.122:1.2: dittheva dhamme anna, sati va upadisese anagamita.
an5.122:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ajjhattanneva sati supatthita hoti dhammanam udayatthagaminiya pannaya, asubhanupassi kaye viharati, ahare patikulasanni, sabbaloke anabhiratasanni, sabbasankharesu aniccanupassi.
an5.122:2.3: Yo hi koci, bhikkhave, bhikkhu va bhikkhuni va ime panca dhamme bhaveti ime panca dhamme bahulikaroti, tassa dvinnam phalanam annataram phalam patikankham—
an5.122:2.4: dittheva dhamme anna, sati va upadisese anagamita”ti.
